original_text: But the Holy Spirit filled Stephen. He looked up to heaven and he saw the bright light of God's glory. He also saw Jesus, who was standing at the right side of God.
korean_text: 스데반이 성령 충만하여 하늘을 우러러 주목하여 하나님의 영광과 및 예수께서 하나님 우편에 서신 것을 보고

sentences.original_text: But the Holy Spirit filled Stephen.
and he saw the bright light of God's glory.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 하나님의 영광의 밝은 빛을 보았다.

sentences.original_text: who was standing at the right side of God.
